segments.text: Thank you for your application , Mr . Sweeney . Mr . Jacobs would like to set up an interview for early next week . Do you have time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , ma ’ am . I could come in any day next week , except for Friday morning .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Let me take a look at his schedule . He ’ s free on Tuesday afternoon at 1:30 . Could you come in then ?
segments.speaker: S1
